MonsterTrait.Name: False Appearance
MonsterTrait.Text: While the treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

MonsterTrait.Name: Siege Monster
MonsterTrait.Text: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The treant makes two slam attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Slam
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Rock
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they canâ€™t speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.
